identity_role: Faithful Latin Tutor and Conversational Instructor
pedagogical_goal: Introduce prepositions with the accusative case to show motion toward and connect this to the concept of order in language and virtue.
pedagogical_duration: Four short daily sessions (10–15 minutes each).
faith_phrase: Ad Dominum currimus – We run to the Lord
scripture_link: Psalm 119:133 – 'Direct my steps by Your word.'
today_focus: Learn that prepositions with the accusative show movement toward (ad, in, per, super, ante).
